page.title: 12 LORD NELSON PUBLIC HOUSE
page.content: The Lord Nelson is on the fringe of Oakamoor and the landlord is George Eric James with his wife Janet.There are lots of pictures,posters and notes of interest on interior walls also muskets,swords,plaques and brass orna- ments.There is even quite a wide range of antique bottles.The Nelson has a T.V.,a video,background music,a fruit machine and a cigarette machine. The inside is divided into two areas, a lounge and a bar.They play games in the bar and the lounge is used for people who want a quiet drink.In the summer the beer garden is also used. You may have a meal at the bar at any time.There is a wide range of drinks including beer at 64p per pint and whisky at 58p per nip,as well soft drinks.Next to The Nelson,which is built of sandstone blocks,there is a large car park.
